text: Alone () is a 1931 Soviet drama movie directed by Leonid Trauberg and Grigori Kozintsev.Событие теленеделиОдна It stars Yelena Kuzmina, Pyotr Sobolevsky, and Sergei Gerasimov. == Actors == * Yelena Kuzmina as Teacher Yelena Kuzmina * Pyotr Sobolevsky as Kuzmina's Fiance * Sergei Gerasimov as Local Council Chairman * Mariya Babanova as Chairman's Wife == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet silent movies Category:1931 drama movies Category:Movies about educators Category:Movies directed by Grigori Kozintsev Category:Movies directed by Leonid Trauberg Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Alone (1931 Soviet movie)
